definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a costly stone, perh. porphyry (cf. Egypt. behiti, behet, behat Brugsch:Dict. v. 438 Dümichen:Gesch. 167 f. Wendel:Altäg. Bau- u. Edelsteine (1888) 77 f.; LXX has smaragdi/thv), Es 1:6 [[עַל]] [[־וׇשֵׁשׁ וְדַר וְסׂחָָרֶת]]´[[רִֽחֲפַת ב]] upon a pavement of porphyry and marble, etc.
